snippet: After he quit driving, Mr. Shelby began building his Cobras in 1962, and his company became one of the most successful independent sports-car builders of the era.
abstract: Carroll Shelby, innovative car designer who added muscle to American auto racing, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: After he quit driving, Mr. Shelby began building his Cobras in 1962, and his company became one of the most successful independent sports-car builders of the era.

headline.seo: Carroll Shelby, Builder of Cobra Sports Car, Dies at 89
headline.main: Carroll Shelby, Car Builder Who Added Muscle to American Racing, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Carroll Shelby, Car Builder Who Added Muscle to American Racing, Dies at 89
